cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. I give you warmth and help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌞 You need sunglasses to look at me.
🌎 I am closest star to Earth.

cosmos.question: I am round and I go around the Sun. You live here! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I have lots of plants.
💧 I have lots of water.
🏠 You are standing on me right now.

cosmos.question: I am in the sky at night, and I sometimes look like a banana. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me.
🌕 Sometimes I am full, sometimes I am not.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I'm a hot ball of gas, far away in the sky. There are lots and lots of me. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle at night.
🌌 I can be different colors.
🔭 You can see me with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am red, and people wonder if tiny creatures once lived on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I am named after a Roman god of war.
🚀 Robots have driven around on me.
🌎 I am Earth's neighbor.

cosmos.question: I am very, very big and have many rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am a planet.
🔭 You need a telescope to see my rings clearly.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them are animals.
📜 Ancient people used me to tell stories.
🌌 I am a pattern in the night sky.

cosmos.question: I am a hot star with planets going around me. I am part of a galaxy. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐I am the center of my planetary system.
🔥I am a giant ball of fire.
☀️Earth goes around me

cosmos.question: I am a giant group of stars, gas, and dust, all held together. Our sun lives inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am named after a drink.
🌀 I have a spiral shape.
🔭 I am very, very big, and have lots of stars.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of planets that circle a star. Earth is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ My star is the sun.
🪐 I have 8 planets.
🌎 We live on one of my planets.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I can be used to make a snowman.
🧤 You need gloves when you play with me.
🌨️ I only come out in the winter.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and hot in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I help plants grow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🔥 I can make you feel very warm.

weather.question: I come from the sky and make the ground wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I am here.
💧 Plants love me.
🌧️ I fall in drops.

weather.question: I blow hard and make the trees sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make leaves fall off trees.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 I am like moving air.

weather.question: I'm a colorful arc that appears after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🌦️ I appear when the sun is shining and it's raining.
🍀 Some people think there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I sometimes look like sheep.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
☁️ I can block the sun.

weather.question: I'm a loud crash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come with a flash of light.
⛈️ Dogs and cats might get scared of me.
🔊 I make a BOOM sound.

weather.question: I am frozen rain, small and hard, that falls from the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 Sometimes I bounce when I hit the ground.
🥄 I am smaller than snowballs.
🌨️ I can hurt if I fall on your head.

weather.question: I am a very strong, spinning storm over the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a name, like a person.
🌊 I have very strong winds and lots of rain.
🌪️ Boats don't want to be near me.

weather.question: I am a cold and icy wind that makes it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I bring a lot of snow.
🧣 You need lots of warm clothes when I am here.
🧊 Schools might close because of me.
